name: Out of Hand
description:
Join us on Discord!

Get ready for a wild, fast-paced, and hilarious gaming experience! Unleash chaos and show off your skills in epic battles where anything goes.


Join up to 8 players on the battlefield! Controller is recommended, but supports mouse and keyboard for one player. You can play online with friends through Steam Remote Play!




Use your physics-based hand to grab items around the map. Then throw them at your friends!




Uhh banana?




Play on over 30 unique levels with varied gameplay!
